page.title: 22Reloaded in 2011
page.content:
The Thorpe Hospital did indeed close and has been an open grass area for at least 20 years. NHS care for all was transferred to Hartlepool General Hospital which also this year (2011)is about to close. A new facility is to be built on the A19 at Wynyard by private finance under the government Private Initiative programme but at the moment has not started.Patients from Peterlee and the surrounding villages and including Hartlepool travel to Middlesborough to two other NHS Hospitals . The NHS has been radically overhauled.
